oai_dc:dc.dc:title: War Songs and Poems of the Southern Confederacy, 1861-1865
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A 1904 original edition compilation of wartime Southern songs and poems by H. M. Wharton, D.D."An Ex-Confederate in General Lee's Army" "A Collection of the Most Popular and Impressive Songs and Poems of War Times, Dear to Every Southern Heart, Collected and Retold with Personal Reminiscences of the War"
